# Info Label

**Tag:** `cui-info-label`  
**Category:** components  
**Source:** https://coherence-ftekb0dcfpcjb3gv.b02.azurefd.net/resources/info-label/

## Import

```js
import '@charm-ux/cui/dist/components/info-label/index.js'
```


> An info label is a label followed by an info button icon that provides additional, non-critical information in a built-in tooltip. Info label is a separate component from a

## Guidance

### Standards

- You must meet the following requirements when using this component.

### Anatomy

- Unlike Fluent—where labels are standalone component—Coherence incorporates labels directly into the appropriate component. Go to the examples section for components with label functionality.

### Examples

- Info label is available wherever labels are used. In addition to input here are some controls where info label can be used.

### Provide feedback

- Reach out to us if you spot a bug or have a feature request. Your feedback is critical to the success of Coherence and everyone who uses it.
